div.p: This is a demo SPA (Single Page Application) making use of aspLite. Various sample forms, plugins and utilities are showcased over here. The location of the ASP-code involved, is displayed each time.
For the record, a "Single Page Application" does not mean a "small" application. This SPA includes a few dozen of Ajax forms. But that number can easily grow to 100 for larger SPA's.
This demo also executes one ASP page only: default.asp in the root of this installation. That ASP file acts as a dispatcher (handler) that deals with all events. See /default/handler.asp.
Finally, please note that aspLite is by no means limited to SPA's, but I thought - for the purpose of this demo - it would be fun to do it the SPA-way.
Have fun while discovering the bits and bytes of this demo!
